acidBlast.name: Acid Blast
acidBlast.rules: When this model is destroyed, models within 2" of it suffer a POW 12 corrosion damage roll and the corrosion continuous effect.

acidicMist.name: Acidic Mist
acidicMist.rules: This model has {rule:concealment}. Living enemy models without {advantage:resistanceCorrosion} suffer -2 to attack rolls while within 2" of this model.

annihilator.name: Annihilator
annihilator.rules: This model gains an {rule:additionalDie} on melee attack and melee damage rolls against living models. When a living model is destroyed within 3" of this model, it never generates a soul token.

apparition.name: Apparition
apparition.rules: During your Control Phase, place this model anywhere completely within 2" of its current location.

banish.name: Banish
banish.rules: When this weapon damages an enemy non-Leader model, immediately after the attack is resolved you can place the enemy model anywhere completely within 1" of its current location.

battlePlan.name: Battle Plan
battlePlan.rules: This model can use one of the following plans at any time during its activation:

blackMantle.name: Black Mantle
blackMantle.rules: While B2B with this model, friendly Faction models gain {advantage:stealth}.

bloodBoon.name: Blood Boon
bloodBoon.rules: Once per activation, immediately after resolving an attack in which it destroyed an enemy model with this weapon, this model can cast a spell without spending focus or fury points.

bloodShadow.name: Blood Shadow
bloodShadow.rules: If this attack boxes a living or {advantage:undead} model, this model can gain {advantage:incorporeal} for one round.

chopShop.name: Chop Shop
chopShop.rules: When a model in this model's {rule:battlegroup} destroys an enemy {advantage:construct} model with a melee attack, remove d3 +1 damage points from one model in this model's {rule:battlegroup} currently in its control range and remove the destroyed model from play.

darkDomination.name: Dark Domination
darkDomination.rules: When this model hits an enemy warjack that has a non-crippled cortex with a basic melee attack made with this weapon during this model's activation, you can take control of the warjack. Immediately after the attack has been resolved, you can make a full advance with the warjack and can then make one basic attack, then Dark Domination expires. A warjack can be affected by Dark Domination only once per turn.

darkShroud.name: Dark Shroud
darkShroud.rules: While within 2" of this model, enemy models suffer -2 ARM.

deathToll.name: Death Toll [$1]
deathToll.rules: When this weapon boxes a living enemy warrior model, remove that model from play and return one Grunt to a friendly $1 unit within 8" of this model. Place the Grunt within 2" of another model in that unit. The Grunt must forfeit its Normal Movement and Combat Action the turn it is put into play.

digIn.name: Dig In
digIn.rules: This model gains {rule:cover}, gains {advantage:resistanceBlast}, and does not block LOS. The model remains dug in until it moves, is placed, or is {rule:engaged}. It can begin the game dug in.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.rules: This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved.

entropicForce.name: Entropic Force
entropicForce.rules: While within 5" of this model, enemy models lose {advantage:tough} and cannot have damage removed from them.

erosion.name: Erosion
erosion.rules: This model gains an {rule:additionalDie} on this weapon's damage rolls against {advantage:construct} models.

feignDeath.name: Feign Death
feignDeath.rules: This model cannot be targeted by ranged or arcane attacks while {rule:knockedDown}.

gang.name: Gang
gang.rules: When making a melee attack targeting an enemy model in the melee range of another model in this unit, this model gains +2 to melee attack and melee damage rolls.

gatesOfHell.name: Gates of Hell
gatesOfHell.rules: Once per activation, immediately after resolving an attack in which this model destroyed a living or {advantage:undead} enemy model with this weapon, this model can spend one soul token to be placed anywhere completely within 4" of its current location, then its activation ends.

ghostShield.name: Ghost Shield
ghostShield.rules: This model gains +1 ARM for each soul token currently on it.

grapplingHook.name: Grappling Hook
grapplingHook.rules: At the end this models activation, this model can spend 1 focus point to be placed completely within 5" of its current location.

hexBlast.name: Hex Blast
hexBlast.rules: Hex Blast is a RNG 10, AOE 2, POW 13/8 arcane attack. Enemy upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit directly hit by Hex Blast immediately expire.

invocationOfBitterestNight.name: Invocation of Bitterest Night
invocationOfBitterestNight.rules: This model gains {advantage:stealth} and {ability:blackMantle} for one round.

knowledgeOfTheDamned.name: Knowledge of the Damned
knowledgeOfTheDamned.rules: When a model in this model's control range makes an attack or damage roll, this model can spend a soul token to cause that model to reroll the roll. Each roll can be rerolled only once due to Knowledge of the Damned.

lifeDrinker.name: Life Drinker
lifeDrinker.rules: When this model boxes a living enemy model with this weapon, this model can remove d3 damage points.

magicAbility.name: Magic Ability
magicAbility.rules: Performing a Magic Ability special action or special attack counts as casting a spell.

necrosurgery.name: Necrosurgery [$1]
necrosurgery.rules: Target friendly {advantage:undead} Faction model. If the model is in range, remove $1 damage points from it.

poltergeist.name: Poltergeist
poltergeist.rules: When an enemy model misses this model with an attack, immediately after the attack is resolved you can choose to push the enemy model d3" directly away from this model.

precisionStrike.name: Precision Strike
precisionStrike.rules: While within 10" of this model, friendly models ignore other friendly models when determining LOS. Friendly models can advance through other friendly models within 10" of this model if they have enough movement to move completely past them. Precision Strike lasts for one turn.

relentlessCharge.name: Relentless Charge
relentlessCharge.rules: While advancing as part of a charge, this model gains {advantage:pathfinder}.

repair.name: Repair [$1]
repair.rules: Target friendly Faction {advantage:construct} model. If the model is in range, remove $1 damage points from it.

repairable.name: Repairable
repairable.rules: This model can be targeted with Repair special actions as if it were a {advantage:construct} model.

reposition.name: Reposition [$1]
reposition.rules: At the end of this model/unit's activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to $1, then its activation ends.

retaliatoryStrike.name: Retaliatory Strike
retaliatoryStrike.rules: If this model is hit by an enemy melee attack during your opponent's turn, after that attack is resolved this model can immediately make one basic melee attack against the attacking model. This model can make only one Retaliatory Strike per turn.

soulTakerCullSoul.name: Soul Taker: Cull Soul
soulTakerCullSoul.rules: This model can gain soul tokens. When a living enemy model is destroyed within 2" of this model, this model gains the destroyed model's soul token. After this model replenishes its focus during your next Control Phase, replace each soul token with 1 focus point.

soulTakerSpectralScavenger.name: Soul Taker: Spectral Scavenger
soulTakerSpectralScavenger.rules: This model can gain soul tokens. When a living model is destroyed in this model's control range, this model gains the destroyed model's soul token. This model can have up to three soul tokens at any time. This model can spend soul tokens for the following:

specialOrders.name: Special Orders
specialOrders.rules: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit. If the model/unit is in range, it gains {ability:reposition} [3"] for one turn.

strengthOfDeath.name: Strength of Death
strengthOfDeath.rules: During its Combat Action, this model can spend soul tokens to {rule:boost} one attack or damage roll for each token spent.

sustainedAttack.name: Sustained Attack
sustainedAttack.rules: During this model's activation, when it makes an attack with this weapon against the last model hit by the weapon this activation, the attack automatically hits.

tenacity.name: Tenacity
tenacity.rules: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit. If the model/unit is in range, it gains {ability:feignDeath} for one round.

vengeance.name: Vengeance
vengeance.rules: During your Maintenance Phase, if one or more models in this unit were damaged by enemy attacks during the last round, each model in the unit can advance 3" and make one basic melee attack.

vitalMagic.name: Vital Magic
vitalMagic.rules: When a spell or special rule would cause one or more of this model's upkeep spells to expire, this model can keep one or more of its upkeep spells in play by suffering d3 damage points for each spell kept in play.

volumeFire.name: Volume Fire
volumeFire.rules: Gain +1 to attack and damage rolls with this weapon against medium-based models and +2 to attack and damage rolls against larger-based models.

wraithbinder.name: Wraithbinder
wraithbinder.rules: While within 10" of this model, friendly {advantage:incorporeal} models gain +3 ARM.
